text: me tike yaluwo goda denekuge post kiyawanna bari wuna.
ji withaya aruthbara kara ganimata apa hamoma eka lesa kamathiyi.
widiyo 'madhya nidahasa yanu madhya ayithikaruge nidahasayi'
motar ratha kamkaruwan, guruwarun ha lokaya wata anekuth kamkaruwange aragalaye waishayika uthpreranaya wanne kamkaru panthiye siyalu kotas ekata ada ganna wu maha wadawarjanayakata yi.
eyata mahindawadinta da kamathiwannata sidu wewi.
nauuru walata adala lipi
me dawaswala poddak ekek mawa bayit ekata ganna hadanawa.

manawawansha ha sanskruthika adhyana pilibanda wisheshagnyayeku wana dilli wishwa widyalaye mahacharya rastram baruda athupa wideshiya wisheshagnyayoda kalaniya wishwa widyalaye jyeshta mahacharya raj somadewa mahathada mehidi deshana pawathwathi.
ee ganu lamaya dan bohoma janapriya niliyek.
man hithanne lankawe giye sisan 4 withara wenna oona.

wishrama ganimen pasu polis wishesha karya balakayata ayath jip rathayak bhawithayata ganimen rupiyal 140,000kata aasanna mudalak awabhawitha kalayi kiyana siddhiyak sambandhayen wishesha karya balakaye hitapu anadena niladhari niyojya polispathi ke.el.em. sarathchandra mahatha athadanguwata gena rakshitha bandhanagaragatha kara thibu athara adala niyojya polispathiwaraya eeye (28) kolambaa mahesthrath adhikaranayata idiripath kala awasthawedi kolambaa pradhana mahesthrath gihan pilapitiya mahatha laksha 10 bagin sharira apa dekak matha apa laba dimata niyoga kaleya.
kadambari, loku du, daupadi dewani du karapitiya waidya pitaye dewani wasare.
batahirata dos pawarana boho nayakayange daruwan pawa adhyapanaya labanne batahira ratawala bawa ekko samajawadaya 100% k hodayi.
giga bayit 8ka ram ekak samangin samsung supiri balawatha kala eli basi (widiyo)
wenisiyulawe kumanthranayak salasum kara, mulyanaya kota, wenisiyulawa thula kumanthrana kriyawalin salasum kara, eksath janapadaya danatamath salasum kara atha.
harakotiya githaya liyawenne saddha mangala suriyabandara athin.
palamu wathawata rajapaksha gabadawe wedi beheth pus kannata wiya.
ehi rachakaya thama adahas aadhanagrahi no wi adina wa idiripath karana bawa pene.
thama chithrapataya thiragatha wune na.
mul kalina chithrapatawaladi mage pemwathun lesa rangapawe jo abewikrama, aananda jayarathna, toni ranasinha, gamini fonseka wage naluwan.
hamme menna yanthan ganu lamaya kalayakata passe awith.
ududumbara kashyapa swaminwahanse pasugiya janawariye oostreliyawe di da dharma deshana pawathwuweya.
dalada wahanse nomathi bawin balaporoththuwe prarthana nuwarata rajyathwaya pama kaleya.
ee atharathura boho sindi bihiwiya.
adahas waranayak natha.

eda wagema thamayi.”wimal amathiwaraya sinaha wemin pawasiya.“oya adath kola pata andala.

islam mehidi ewani parshawayan adahas kale natha.

manda minisun jiwath wanneda wahasi bas, awalada, sampraplapa, boruwa saha wanchawa rajayana sankruthika awakashayaka nisaya.
apita uugen athi wadak na...."
eyin pradhana ma hethuwak thamayi sinharajayata giya winoda charikawa!

ganithayedith eekale sulukarana piliwela mathaka thiyagaththe ‘wanbewadari‘ kiyala.
mewani katayuthuwalin pennum kerenne aanduwa me rate adhyapanaya sitha mathama bankoloth thaththwayata pathkarana bawayi.

para depasa raswu janaya wishmayen yuthuwa bala siti.gelata wadamal malawak palandi asarana tharunaya wadhaka bera hada madhyaye dangediya wetha ragena yana ayuru bala sitima dukmusuya.rajya yakadura wuwath ohu kisidineka dushta kriyawak sidu karanu kisiwaku asa daka natha.ohuge penuma bala sitinnanwa thawath musapath karayi.wenada dangediyata genayana darunu soreku aparadhakarayeku desa raswa sitinnan bala sitinne sora ho aparadhakaruta hoda wade yayi sathutu sithini.samaharu bimata kela gasanne sorage munata kela gasannak men tharahini.namuth ada ewannak daknata natha.ane asarana oddi katawath karadarayak thibune naha.maranna tharam mokakda karapu warada?samaharu kasu kusu gayi."sura mathin aga bisawata karadara karanna gihin kiyanne."

ehidi aththanagalla wadabalana mahesthrath sithara miwalage mahathmiya mahara bandhanagaraye adhikariwarayata niyoga kale, sakakaruwan labana 22 wanida handunaganime perattuwakata idiripath karana lesayi.
mona jathiye ewunda balanna ithin ara nathi wechcha eka wa hoyanneth nathuwa, muhudu wathuren mada hodagena, nambar plet eka damej wechcha wahaneka aapahu wadata yanna hadanawa kiyanne?

ada me indagena ariyas kawar karanawa.

daru dedenagenuth magenuth samuganime wedanawa ayata menma matada mahath lesa danuni.
